author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ceco Environmental Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.17
text:
May 10 (Reuters) - CECO Environmental Corp:
* CECO ENVIRONMENTAL CORP. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.05
* Q1 REVENUE FELL 20 PERCENT TO $74.1 MILLION * SAYS TOTAL BACKLOG AT MARCH 31, 2018 WAS $182.1 MILLION AS COMPARED WITH $168.9 MILLION ON DECEMBER 31, 2017
* SAYS BOOKINGS WERE $95.0 MILLION FOR Q1 OF 2018, COMPARED WITH $84.0 MILLION IN PRIOR-YEAR PERIOD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
